data.actual_result: a "careful you have unsaved changes" popup appears
data.expected_result: "unsaved changed" popup should only appear when going to another section/tab or exiting (with unsaved changes)
data.short_description: clicking on the same section in setting shows a unsaved changes popup
data.steps_to_repro: - go to server settings - go to overview then make some changes - click on overview again and observe
